files.description: Library module that loads runtime/outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json, rewrites tracked artifact paths to their canonical equivalents, preserves formatting/ordering where possible, and validates that all referenced files exist post-migration.

missionDescription: Canonicalize and migrate deliverables from agent-specific paths (e.g., .../code-creation/... and document-creation outputs) into a single canonical tree under runtime/outputs/. Update runtime/outputs/PROJECT_TRACKER.json to point to the migrated canonical files and generate runtime/outputs/CANONICALIZATION_REPORT.md documenting old->new mappings.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
